This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Paste plain text into editable <div>. 
PASS Paste decorated text into editable <div>. 
PASS Paste text with multiple errors into editable <div>. 
PASS Paste plain text into <input>. 
PASS Paste decorated text into <input>. 
PASS Paste text with multiple errors into <input>. 
PASS Paste plain text into <textarea>. 
PASS Paste decorated text into <textarea>. 
PASS Paste text with multiple errors into <textarea>. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
